title.bibl: Naujienos, Mar. 11, 1916. Attention, West Side Lithuanians!

div.bibl: Naujienos, Mar. 11, 1916. ATTENTION, WEST SIDE LITHUANIANS!

body.p: Chapter 22 of the Lithuanian Socialist Alliance will sponsor a mass meeting at M. Meldazis Hall, 2242 West 23rd Place, on Sunday, March 12. The editor of the Naujienos, P. Grigaitis, will deliver an address entitled "The Five Failures of the Present Order". The public will be permitted to join the discussion following the address.
Those who wish to become informed in order that they too may inform others should not miss this opportunity. The mass meeting will begin at 2 P. M. Admission is free.
